section.title: Move Entries dialog
section.para: The Move Entries dialog is used to move entries to another parent.
To start the Move Entries dialog select the entries you want to move, then choose Move... from context menu.
Note: Some directories doesn't support moving whole trees but only moving leaf entries. Also it is not possible to move base entries or the root DSE.
